name: Icom Systems
description: ICOM is a company dedicated to the development of Web, Mobile, Cloud and Social Software software. The team are committed to technology, creativity and innovation. Their main objective is to bring to their clients development and technology solutions that will fulfill their business objectives. The agency is backed by 10 years of experience in the market with more than 300 projects and more than 4 million users who uses their applications.

locations.address: Av. Presidente Juarez No. 2007 Col. Los Reyes Industrial Tlalnepantla Centro
